mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trains (train_number, departure_station_id, arrival_station_id, departure_time, arrival_time, duration, business_seats, first_seats, second_seats) VALUES (#{trainNumber}, #{departureStationId}, #{arrivalStationId}, #{departureTime}, #{arrivalTime}, #{duration}, #{businessSeats}, #{firstSeats}, #{secondSeats})
mapper.select: select trains.id,train_number,departure_time,arrival_time,duration,business_seats,first_seats,second_seats, (select station_name from stations where departure_station_id = stations.id ) as departure_station_name, (select city from stations where departure_station_id = stations.id) as departure_station_city, (select station_name from stations where arrival_station_id = stations.id) as arrival_station_name, (select city from stations where arrival_station_id = stations.id) as arrival_station_city from trains left join stations on trains.departure_station_id = stations.id
